content: **you can view this pattern for free on my blog or purchase it here to print free of ads ** click here 1 for the free pattern this original pattern was written by me katy i call this pattern the stash busting monster pouf i designed it to use up scraps of yarn us crocheters are always stuck with the monster pouf makes for a great place for a child to sit the kids love them it also makes for a great dog bed or pillow for an adult to sit on the pouf measures approx 12 high this is easily adjustable by about 22 wide what you ll need i/5 5mm hook worsted weight yarn about 1810 yards total scissors yarn needle stuffing for the stuffing you can used whatever you have on hand i used 4 afghans you could use pillows blankets sheets towels poly-fill scrap fabric **don t worry about your stuffing being permanent the bottom comes off for easy washing skill level advanced beginner this pattern and photos may not be redistributed or copied in any way finished items may be sold if you choose to sell the finished item online please credit me as the designer and add a link to my shop www ktandthesquid etsy com 1 http //ktandthesquid com/2016/06/10/stash-busting-monster-pouf-a-free-crochet-pattern-kt-and-thesquid/
